import React, { useContext } from "react"; function AccountLikesItem({ product, size, itemId }) { function DeleteItemLikes() { fetch("http://localhost:3000/DeleteLikes", { method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify({ likes_id: itemId }), headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }) .then(data => data.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)) } function AddBasketDelLikes() { fetch("http://localhost:3000/basketChange", { method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify({ likes_id: itemId }), headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }) .then(data => data.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)) } return (

  • {product.product_name}

      Цвет: {product.color}

      Цена: {product.price}$

      Pазмер:

    • ) } export default AccountLikesItem
